value_proposition.summary: Positions itself as the centre of future energy, offering meaningful work on nationally critical, large-scale infrastructure and green transition projects across the EPSO-G group.

purpose_impact.summary: Frames its purpose around ensuring Lithuania’s energy independence and system reliability while enabling the shift from traditional to sustainable, digitalised energy systems.

target_talent_profile.summary: Primarily targets experienced technical professionals in energy infrastructure—engineers, electricians, project managers and systems/IT analysts—rather than entry-level or generic office profiles.

company_culture.summary: Emphasises responsibility for national critical infrastructure, collaboration in expert teams, safety and a progress-oriented mindset, in a relatively formal but supportive organisational culture with some flexibility (e.g. remote work options).

learning_possibilities.summary: Offers structured development via internal and external trainings, professional memberships and close work with recognised experts, with additional growth coming from unique, complex and challenging projects in the evolving energy sector.
